Class PacManWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.world.World<info.gridworld.actor.Actor>
      • PacManWorld

  • public class PacManWorld
extends info.gridworld.world.World<info.gridworld.actor.Actor>
    PacManWorld is used to initiate a game of Pac-Man in GridWorld.

    2012-12-25

    • Constructor Detail

      • PacManWorld

        public PacManWorld(java.lang.String loadfile,
           java.lang.String[] pacManClasses,
           java.lang.String[] ghostClasses)
        Constructs a PacManWorld
        Parameters:
        loadfile - file representing the maze
        pacManClasses - array of strings representing PacManInterface classes to construct, you must have at least one.
        ghostClasses - array of strings representing GhostInterface classes to construct, you may have none of these if you wish, but must have an empty array.
